column1: Drug Toxicology and Safety Pharmacology - MSc
column5: This full-time Master's programme provides a comprehensive overview of drug safety practices within the drug development process.It addresses key aspects of preclinical drug evaluation through the study of:Drug discovery and developmentSafety pharmacologyMechanisms of drug-induced toxicitiesRegulatory affairsBioanalytical sciencesIt will give you state-of-the-art training in preclinical toxicology, with an emphasis on the molecular in vitro and in vivo aspects of toxicology and safety pharmacology assessments.As part of the programme you will undertake an original research project that will be the basis of your dissertation.
